text: Hanki Safiri kumapima nemaniza vahe'mota, tamagazegu nehuta tamavatera kukena omanesiaza kina vahe kna huta ru moparega viho. Za'anani kumapima nemaniza vahe'mo'za kuma zamimofo vihufintira atre'za atioramigahaze. Ana nehuta zavi krafama hanazana Bet-Ezeli kumapi vahe'mo'zama eme tamazama osnaza zanku anara hugahaze.
